service.description: Indexes documents passed using ElasticSearch. The DataDocument must have an indexName.
Index all documents associated with the feed within the date range. Recommend calling through the IndexDataFeedDocuments service job.

actions.message: Indexed ${documentsIndexed} documents for feed ${dataFeedId} in ${System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime}ms

service.description: Find all pages in space, make sure each has a WikiPage record, and index the page for searching.

actions.message: Found and indexed ${allChildFileFlatList.size()} pages in Wiki Space [${wikiSpaceId}], created DB records for ${recordsCreated}.

service.description:
The queryString format is the ElasticSearch supported one, based on the Lucene query strings which are documented here:
https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/query-dsl-query-string-query.html
Sort options are described here:
http://www.elasticsearch.org/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/search-request-sort.html

parameter.name: documentType
parameter.description: The ElasticSearch document type. For DataDocument based docs this is the dataDocumentId.

parameter.name: documentList
parameter.description: List of documents, each document is a Map with nested Maps and Lists of Maps.

parameter.name: documentListCount
parameter.description: The total count of hits, not just the limited number returned.
